commit message: First check-in the Android X server.
Fix bug in pointer button mapping.
Fixed bug in length of property value.
Fixed bug in processing text request.
Fixed bug with name color lookup.
Fixed bug with setting background color.
Improved the way background colours are handled.
Fixed a bug with window stacking.

Renamed ClientComms to Client. Allowing multiple clients to listen on
events.

Fixed subwindow repositioning. Improved deletion due to client
disconnect.
Ensure DestroyNotify events are sent correctly when a client exits.
Use the volume control buttons for mouse left/right.
Better bounds checking when dealing with bitmaps.
Fix the return type when a property doesn't exist.

Added an access control editor.
Can now be launched from x11:// VIEW intents.
Fixed a bug with client-initiated screen blanking.
Improved the way timestamps are calculated.
Added a menu option to bring up ConnectBot.

Fixed the invocation of a window manager service. This might actually
work.
Works with different versions of ConnectBot.
Handle a Z pixmap with a depth of 1.
Added the ability to specify the minor opcode in error responses.
Added the ability to handle 64-bit integers and bit arrays.
Fixed a typo in the comments.
Handle big requests, use bytes where appropriate.

Defined some extensions, used bytes where appropriate, minor bug fixes
and documentation clean-up.
Implements the SHAPE extension, bytes used where appropriate.
Moved Extension back to a private class.
Cleaned up handling of modifier keys.
Close the client connections *before* destroying the activity.
Work around crashes caused by hardware acceleration.
Don't delete resources while iterating through them.
Fixed bug caused by overflowing byte values.
Free up bitmaps when they are no longer needed.

Try to use bitmap memory more efficiently. Check for PutImage bad match
before checking data length.

Send an X Alloc error instead of crashing when a memory allocation error
occurs.
Don't try to draw backgrounds using pixmaps that have been freed.
Removed dependency on touch screen. Should now work with Google TV.
Applied fixes submitted by Michael Enke.
Assorted bug fixes and minor clean-up.
Use of FreeColors is not a fatal error.
Fixed a bug calculating font widths.
Changed the name of monospaced fonts.
Handle some more out of memory errors.
Fixed crash when destroying the server with multiple clients running.
Caught another out of memory error.
Fixed entry of IP addresses in a text field.
